scripts.prod: docker-compose down && npm run build && docker-compose up -d
scripts.repair: npm run clean && docker image prune -af && npx npm-check-updates -u --reject tailwindcss && npm i --verbose --force && npm run pull:images && npm run start:postgresql && sleep 10 && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.start:postgresql: npm run delete:postgresql && docker run --rm -d --name dev-postgresql -p 5432:5432 -v "${PWD}/.postgresql":/var/lib/postgresql/data -e POSTGRES_USER=admin -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=supersecret -e POSTGRES_DB=boardapp postgres:latest
scripts.start:redis: npm run delete:redis && docker run --rm -d --name dev-redis -p 6379:6379 -v "${PWD}/.redis":/data redis:latest
scripts.delete:postgresql: docker ps -q --filter "name=dev-postgresql" | xargs -r docker stop && docker ps -aq --filter "name=dev-postgresql" | xargs -r docker rm
scripts.delete:redis: docker ps -q --filter "name=dev-redis" | xargs -r docker stop && docker ps -aq --filter "name=dev-redis" | xargs -r docker rm
scripts.fix:prisma: npm run start:postgresql && sleep 10 && npx prisma migrate dev && docker stop dev-postgresql
scripts.pull:images: docker pull postgres:latest && docker pull redis:latest
scripts.clean: docker ps -aq | xargs -r docker stop && docker ps -aq | xargs -r docker rm && (if exist node_modules rmdir /s /q node_modules) && (if exist dist rmdir /s /q dist) && (if exist .angular rmdir /s /q .angular) && (if exist .nx rmdir /s /q .nx) && (if exist .vscode rmdir /s /q .vscode) && (if exist .redis rmdir /s /q .redis) && (if exist .postgresql rmdir /s /q .postgresql) && (if exist .nginx-logs rmdir /s /q .nginx-logs) && (if exist .fail2ban rmdir /s /q .fail2ban) && (if exist prisma\migrations rmdir /s /q prisma\migrations) && (if exist .package-lock.json del .package-lock.json)
scripts.build: npm i --verbose && npx nx build frontend && npx nx build backend
